title: How to publish an article easily - Quora

response.answer_text: All you need to do is have a great idea that is in some way different from anyone else’s and will be of intense interest to many people, or a specific group; dig up background research or conduct interviews as called for; and review all your thinking and supporting material from your audience’s perspective so you can present it in a way that directly relates to their interests, concerns or problems. Next, create a compelling perspective. Strategize the presentation to identify the most engaging lead and determine a logical sequence for the rest. Finally, write a first draft . Then review it multiple times until your argument is clear and concise and logical. Then edit through as many versions as necessary to achieve a good narrative rhythm and basically correct grammar. Find a strong ending. Proofread obsessively to eliminate any mistakes in content or language that undermine your credibility. Oh yes—somewhere along the way decide on the publication you’re aiming for and thoroughly review three or more issues. Analyze the readers and their interests; check on whether anything close to your subject has been published before. Now take time to craft a compelling pitch tailored to the particular editor of the particular publication you want the article to appear in. Don’t forget to communicate your credentials for writing about the subject and previous publishing credits. Be prepared to customize content and approach to the editor’s needs. Major or minor revising is often requested. If all this Sounds like work, there’s always Plan B. Buy the publication from the owners. Then you can print anything you want.
